Texts.Chs: 终于，我的走私包裹到了。这是我的听差在深夜送来的。它没有让我失望。在炼金术配方上，叶族的绿手指无愧于大师之名。我喝了一口，我能感觉到我的力量在增强，我的身体在变得强韧。
Texts.Eng: Finally, my contraband package arrived. Delivered in the dead of night by my manservant. It did not disappoint. Greenfinger of the Floran truly is a master when it comes to alchemical formulas. I took one sip and already I could feel my strength boosting, my body hardening.

Texts.Chs: 明天，我们将开始拳击练习。我可怜那些挡我路的愚蠢翼族人。他们将会体验到我不曾展现的一面。黑暗愤怒的一面。而这一面将满载荣光。
Texts.Eng: Tomorrow, we begin sparring practise. I pity the foolish Avians who will get in my way. They're going to experience a side of me they've never seen before. A dark, angry side. And it will be glorious.
